page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: Like Carol, p12, Lisa also lives in Binchester, at 63, Granville Terrace - with her parents & a younger brother. "From my window I can see at least 5 horses in the next field. Mr Weston a teacher at our school has moved into no.1, where Melanie Hill lived". In small communities people know everyone & everything going on. "In my spare time, when I'm not doing homework, I like to play rounders or play cricket". Lisa's father works at Talent Eng., N/ Aycliffe, "I sometimes wait for him at the bus stop...mother likes to go to Spennymoor on a Friday night but she's always home by 11.30,a bit like Cinder ella". They all worry about Paul as he has to play in a lane where older lads "bomb" around on motor-bikes. Lisa, a member of the youth committee, is also active in the local jazz-band.
